entry-2.title: Working on my website!
entry-2.content: Today I put some serious work into my website. It's starting to all come together!

entry-3.title: Added some more javascript
entry-3.content: Today I made all the blog entries populate via javascript instead of static html. It took a while. I also figured out an easy way to add blog entries dynamically using a single json file for all the entries. Now I can add more and change them without restarting the server!!
